Issues.Title: Convert ITextRangeProvider/ITextProvider to Cswin32
Issues.Body:
Related: https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/issues/9795
- Move references of `ITextProvider`, `ITextProvider2`, `ITextRangeProvider` to Cswin32
- Add Improvements to `SafeArrayScope` to be able to receive `SAFEARRAY*` (similar to `ComScope` pattern)
- Add `ComSafeArrayScope` for better usability when we need a `SAFEARRAY` that contains COM interfaces (`SafeArrayScope<nint>`)
- Add explicit operators for converting to/from `VARIANT` and `double`
- Add implicit operator to convert to/from `UiaPoint` and `Point`
- Update tests

###### Microsoft Reviewers: [Open in CodeFlow](https://portal.fabricbot.ms/api/codeflow?pullrequest=https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/10022)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Convert ITextRangeProvider/ITextProvider to Cswin32" (#10022)

Issues.Body:
### Background and motivation

Windows Forms is very amazing and easy to use, and since it's open-source I don't understand how was it still not properly ported to Linux.

Issues.Title: SetParentHandle Win32ExpException
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

net 6.0.22

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

Yes

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

_No response_

### Issue description

A customer is reporting a fatal Win32Exception when trying to open a window in our application. It only happens when opening certain windows.
Exception:
`Message: Fehler beim Festlegen des übergeordneten Win32-Fensters des Steuerelements`

Stack:
`   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetParentHandle(IntPtr value)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl(Boolean fIgnoreVisible)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl(Boolean fIgnoreVisible)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl(Boolean fIgnoreVisible)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl(Boolean fIgnoreVisible)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl()
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WmShowWindow(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.WndProc(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Form.WmShowWindow(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Form.WndProc(Message& m)
   at DevExpress.XtraEditors.DForm.WndProc(Message& m)
   at DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraForm.WndProc(Message& msg)
   at Gebit.Common.Views.UoWViewBase.WndProc(Message& m) in D:\Bamboo\local-working-dir\DDEV-RB36-BUILD\Gebit.Common.Views\BaseUoWViews\UoWViewBase.cs:line 330
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlNativeWindow.WndProc(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Callback(IntPtr hWnd, WM msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam)`

### Steps to reproduce

We cannot reproduce this issue on our side. The customer is using VMWare with VMWare Horizon 8.1.0 clients. Unsure if that will be related
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "SetParentHandle Win32ExpException" (#10014)
